actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of woven fabrics of carded fine animal hair, of woven fabrics of combed wool or combed fine animal hair, and of certain gauzes.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States with respect to the tariff treatment of certain: (1) woven fabrics of carded wool or carded fine animal hair; (2) woven fabrics of combed wool or of combed fine animal hair; and (3) gauzes.

titles.title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of woven fabrics of carded fine animal hair, of woven fabrics of combed wool or combed fine animal hair, and of certain gauzes.
